STATE v. HELLER. No. COA04-1551. Court of Appeal of North Carolina Filed August 2, 2005. Certification Date August 22, 2005. Appeal from the Buncombe (01CRS52648, 02CRS7051, 02CRS7052, 02CRS7053, 04CRS7054, 02CRS7055, 03CRS7056, 02CRS7057, 04CRS2120, 04CRS2122)

Case reported without published opinion No error.
